2.name: , and make everyone speak like pirates

4.name: , and make the characters talk about how they're trapped in a poorly made computer simulation for people to watch over the Internet

5.name: , and make one of the characters speak Korean for no reason

6.name: , and make everyone rhyme their dialogue with each other

7.name: , and make something really weird and wacky happen

8.name: , and make the scene revolve around different characters from the show (while still keeping the overarching story intact)

9.name: , and start the scene with one of the characters complaining about having to censor the show to make it more kid friendly, and then make a poor attempt to censor the rest of the scene to make it kid friendly

10.name: , and make it a crossover episode involving celebrities and/or characters from other works of fiction

11.name: , and make one of the characters announce at the beginning that the following scene was written by a 3 year old, and then write the rest of the scene as if it was written by a 3 year old

12.name: , and make one of the characters try to shoehorn in a famous pop culture quote into their conversation but say it wrong, and all the other characters get mad that they messed it up

13.name: , and add as much fan service as possible
